name: logggai
title: Logggai
description: AI-powered developer content pipeline. Instantly create, publish, and manage devlogs, changelogs, and technical updates from Raycast to LinkedIn, Notion, Jira, Linear, and more.
author: stranxik

commands.name: create-logggai-post
commands.title: Create Logggai Post
commands.subtitle: Quickly create a new devlog or technical update
commands.description: Open a form to write and publish a new Logggai post. Instantly share your devlog to multiple platforms.

commands.name: hello-world
commands.title: Hello World Test
commands.subtitle: Test minimal React Raycast
commands.description: Affiche un champ texte et un bouton pour tester l'environnement React de Raycast.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
